    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>
            <entry>3844</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="no">Elektrisk krets- enkel</string>
            <string language="en">Electric circuit- easy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrischer Stromkreis einfach</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Circuit électrique facile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Circuito elétrico fácil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Circuito elettrico facile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηλεκτρικό κύκλωμα - εύκολο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Circuito eléctrico fácil</string>
          </title>
          <language>no</language>
          <description>
            <string language="no">Studer en enkel liten lukket strømkrets med kun ett batteri, ledninger , en bryter og lyspære</string>
            <string language="en">Study a basic closed-circuit with one battery,cords,one switch and a bulb.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">elektrisk kobling</string>
            <string language="en">electrical connection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">bryter</string>
            <string language="en">switch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">lyspære</string>
            <string language="en">bulb</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Studieren Sie einen grundlegenden geschlossenen 
Stromkreis mit einer Batterie, Netzkabeln, einem Schalter und einer 
Birne.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Étudiez un circuit fermé de base avec une 
batterie, cordes, un commutateur et une ampoule.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estude um circuito fechado básico com uma bateria,
cabos, um interruptor e um bulbo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi un chiuso-circuit di base con una 
batteria, cavi, un interruttore e una lampadina.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μελετήστε ένα βασικό κλειστό κύκλωμα με μια 
μπαταρία, τα σκοινιά, έναν διακόπτη και έναν βολβό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estudie un circuito cerrado básico con una 
batería, las cuerdas, un interruptor y un bulbo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrischer Anschluß</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schalter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Birne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">connexion électrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">commutateur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ampoule</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">conexão elétrica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">interruptor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">bulbo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">collegamento elettrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">interruttore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lampadina</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρική σύνδεση</string>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
